item.title: Comment on FAQs of mybkexperience survey by Sue & Don north
item.dc:creator: Sue & Don north
item.description: I was just at store 6620 I waited 15 minutes for my order and while I was waiting the screeming and yell inside was terrible and then I ordered two double egg, cheese cursants and only got one I was very upset when i left there.
item.content:encoded: I was just at store 6620 I waited 15 minutes for my order and while I was waiting the screeming and yell inside was terrible and then I ordered two double egg, cheese cursants and only got one I was very upset when i left there.
